content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences, but some of the top teams and players to watch out for in the Champions League this season include defending champions Bayern Munich, Messi and the rest of the Paris Saint-Germain team, Ronaldo's return to Manchester United, Manchester City, Liverpool, Chelsea, Real Madrid, and Barcelona. There are also many top players to watch out for, including Neymar, Mbappé, Lewandowski, De Bruyne, Salah, Benzema, Haaland, and more. With so many talented teams and players in the competition, it promises to be an exciting tournament!
